com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal

类 LitePal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.LitePal

  • public class LitePal
extends java.lang.Object
    LitePal is an Android library that allows developers to use SQLite database extremely easy. You can initialized it by calling initialize(Context) method to make LitePal ready to work. Also you can switch the using database by calling use(LitePalDB) and useDefault() methods.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.4

      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Delete the specified database.
      static android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getDatabase()
      Get a writable SQLiteDatabase.
      static void initialize(android.content.Context context)
      Initialize to make LitePal ready to work.
      static void use(LitePalDB litePalDB)
      Switch the using database to the one specified by parameter.
      static void useDefault()
      Switch the using database to default with configuration by litepal.xml.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LitePal

        public LitePal()

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context context)
        Initialize to make LitePal ready to work. If you didn't configure LitePalApplication in the AndroidManifest.xml, make sure you call this method as soon as possible. In Application's onCreate() method will be fine.
        参数:
        context - Application context.

      • getDatabase

        public static android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase getDatabase()
        Get a writable SQLiteDatabase.
        返回:
        A writable SQLiteDatabase instance

      • use

        public static void use(LitePalDB litePalDB)
        Switch the using database to the one specified by parameter.
        参数:
        litePalDB - The database to switch to.

      • useDefault

        public static void useDefault()
        Switch the using database to default with configuration by litepal.xml.

      • deleteDatabase

        public static boolean deleteDatabase(java.lang.String dbName)
        Delete the specified database.
        参数:
        dbName - Name of database to delete.
        返回:
        True if delete success, false otherwise.
